an5.41:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an5.41:1.2: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho anathapindikam gahapatim bhagava etadavoca:
an5.41:1.5: Idha, gahapati, ariyasavako utthanaviriyadhigatehi bhogehi bahabalaparicitehi sedavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi attanam sukheti pineti samma sukham pariharati;
an5.41:1.6: matapitaro sukheti pineti samma sukham pariharati;
an5.41:1.7: puttadaradasakammakaraporise sukheti pineti samma sukham pariharati.
an5.41:2.1: Puna caparam, gahapati, ariyasavako utthanaviriyadhigatehi bhogehi bahabalaparicitehi sedavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi mittamacce sukheti pineti samma sukham pariharati.
an5.41:3.1: Puna caparam, gahapati, ariyasavako utthanaviriyadhigatehi bhogehi bahabalaparicitehi sedavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi ya ta honti apada—
an5.41:3.2: aggito va udakato va rajato va corato va appiyato va dayadato—
an5.41:3.3: tatharupasu apadasu bhogehi pariyodhaya vattati, sotthim attanam karoti.
an5.41:4.1: Puna caparam, gahapati, ariyasavako utthanaviriyadhigatehi bhogehi bahabalaparicitehi sedavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi pancabalim katta hoti.
an5.41:5.1: Puna caparam, gahapati, ariyasavako utthanaviriyadhigatehi bhogehi bahabalaparicitehi sedavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi ye te samanabrahmana madappamada pativirata khantisoracce nivittha ekamattanam damenti ekamattanam samenti ekamattanam parinibbapenti, tatharupesu samanabrahmanesu uddhaggikam dakkhinam patitthapeti sovaggikam sukhavipakam saggasamvattanikam.
an5.41:5.3: Ime kho, gahapati, panca bhoganam adiya.
an5.41:6.1: Tassa ce, gahapati, ariyasavakassa ime panca bhoganam adiye adiyato bhoga parikkhayam gacchanti, tassa evam hoti:
an5.41:6.2: ‘ye vata bhoganam adiya te caham adiyami bhoga ca me parikkhayam gacchanti’ti.
an5.41:6.4: Tassa ce, gahapati, ariyasavakassa ime panca bhoganam adiye adiyato bhoga abhivaddhanti, tassa evam hoti:
an5.41:6.5: ‘ye vata bhoganam adiya te caham adiyami bhoga ca me abhivaddhanti’ti.
